entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then rain showers and flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
